code:
gantt
    title Planificación Round Robin (Infra_WorkerNode) - Parte 1 (Infra_EtcdCluster)
    dateFormat X
    axisFormat %s

    section CPU
    P1(Infra_LoadBalancer)      :active, cpu1, 0, 3
    P2(Infra_LoadBalancer)      :active, cpu2, 3, 6
    P3(Infra_RedisCache)      :active, cpu3, 6, 9
    P4(Infra_LoadBalancer)     :active, cpu4, 9, 11
    P1(Infra_LoadBalancer)    :active, cpu5, 11, 13
    P3(Infra_RedisCache)    :active, cpu6, 13, 14
    P2(Infra_IngressController)    :active, cpu7, 14, 15

    section I/O
    P1_IO(Infra_EtcdCluster) :crit, io1, 13, 15
    P2_IO(Infra_WorkerNode) :crit, io2, 15, 16
    P4_IO(Infra_RedisCache) :crit, io3, 11, 14
